name: pnp-devproxy-demo-openapispec-js
title: Demo: Generate an OpenAPI spec for an API called from a JavaScript app
shortDescription: This sample contains a demo web application connected to a placeholder API. Using Dev Proxy, you can record the API calls made by the sample app and generate an OpenAPI spec for them.
longDescription: This sample contains a demo web application connected to a placeholder API. Using Dev Proxy, you can record the API calls made by the sample app and generate an OpenAPI spec for them.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy configuration file for generating an OpenAPI spec for the demo API
Dev Proxy and sample app running in the terminal
Demo web app connected to the demo API
OpenAPI spec generated by Dev Proxy opened in Visual Studio Code

references.name: Generate an OpenAPI spec
references.description: Learn how to use the Dev Proxy to generate an OpenAPI spec for your API.

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.
